Title: RIA Services DataFilter Control for Silverlight
Description: This RIA Services DataFilter is Silverlight control that designed for Filtering/Sorting/Grouping the Data using DomainDataSource from a kit of pattern NET/WCF RIA Services.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This RIA Services DataFilter is Silverlight control that designed for Filtering/Sorting/Grouping the Data using DomainDataSource from a kit of pattern NET/WCF RIA Services.
